capability.name: Unit Trust Administration
capability.definition: This Service Domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts
capability.role: Unit trusts offer a fixed term investment vehicle for bank customers with terms typically ranging from one to twenty years. Unlike many other types of investment fund the unit trust issues a fixed number of shares and is not actively managed during its term. The fund may exchange severely underperforming assets in rare cases. Investors may be able to exchange shares with other investors within the trust but the fund is essentially 'closed' to the originating investor pool for its full term
capability.example: An investment trust is established and sold to a group of investors

key_features.name: Handle the unit trust's accounting, tax administration and financial reporting needs
key_features.description: Enables handle the unit trust's accounting, tax administration and financial reporting needs to support this service domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts

key_features.name: Package the initial investment for the trust
key_features.description: Enables package the initial investment for the trust to support this service domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts

key_features.name: Handle share exchanges between investors in the trust
key_features.description: Enables handle share exchanges between investors in the trust to support this service domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts

key_features.name: Process management fees
key_features.description: Enables process management fees to support this service domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts

key_features.name: Support/oversee all general investor servicing and process middle and back office functions
key_features.description: Enables support/oversee all general investor servicing and process middle and back office functions to support this service domain handles the implementation and fulfillment of unit investment trusts
